class.name: Page
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: An object to represent a single page
class.property: The data passed to this page from the manifest
The index of this page within it's parent container
The index of this page in the masterPageList of the course
The viewed staus of the page as an integer: 0 not viewed, 1, started, 2 viewed
A collection of language objects available to this page

method.name: getFile
method.param: language short name to get get the file for.
method.return: The file as added by the manifest is returned

method.name: getTitle
method.param: language short name to get get the title for.
method.return: The title as added by the manifest is returned

method.name: addParam
method.description: Parameter as added by the manifest. This method should not be called directly.
method.param: The name of the parameter to add
The data to be held in the parameter. Most often this is a path to an XML or JSON file
The short name of the language this parameter is associated with.

method.name: getParam
method.param: The name of the parameter to return
The short name of the language to return the parameter for

method.name: toSimpleObject
method.description: Returns the page as a serialized POJO without methods only properties.
